title: 【all出】流光•三 — 正篇
body:
read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/2QS188T

by misspersian

①脑洞来自orange123
——手动艾特，非常感谢。
②预警：私设多，有ooc
③文笔渣，排版渣见谅
④之前的那个操作失误我没办法删掉，谨当做公告。请以此处正文为准。
影响您的阅读体验真的十分抱歉。
⑤纯良弔哥，在线护（zhen）妻（xiang）
⑥！本章主死出荼，有R。
⑦提前预祝高考顺利以及端午节快乐。
这里备好工具方便您切粽子和调味。

tags: Mainly calling out boku no hero academia
summary:
Ya know, shounen worlds, especially the ones with super powers, absolutely make me laugh. 
Like, and I'm not talking about the...
body:
Ya know, shounen worlds, especially the ones with super powers, absolutely make me laugh.

Like, and I’m not talking about the actual creators of the shows, but the gods of the worlds of anime must be having a field day when telling themselves-

“Alright, since I’m getting tired of this war shit that’s been going on for some millennia now, let’s give them all super powers so that after another 100 years when they get rid of all the racist criticism, they’ll play heroes and villains as adults”

When in reality, it’s like-

“Let’s see which one of these idiots figure out that they could kill me”

blog.name: ao3feed-bakudeku
blog.title: ao3feed-BakuDeku
blog.description:
Katsuki Bakugou / Izuku Midoriya fanfics on Ao3
Blog created April 2, 2019. No fics before this date will be archived.
This page is still under construction

title: The Female Problem
description:
by Razzelberry

How the hell didn’t I notice any of this? What the hell happened to me?! WHY AM I A GIRL?!? He felt like he was about to faint. Just as he started to wobble the door to his shower stall was ripped open. Izuku whipped around to see who it was. There stood Bakugou with a small towel wrapped around his waist and Todoroki standing a small distance behind
“Would you shu-“ Bakugou stop mid sentence and mid reach. He had planned on ripping Midoriya out of the shower and beating him for being to damn noisy. But instead of the damn nerd he was greeted with the sight of a a girl who looked like Deku but was obviously not.
“Midoriya is that you?” Todorokis voice went up only an octave. .

Words: 1911, Chapters: 1/1, Language: English

  • Fandoms: 僕のヒーローアカデミア | Boku no Hero Academia | My Hero Academia
  • Rating: Not Rated
  • Warnings: Creator Chose Not To Use Archive Warnings, Underage
  • Categories: F/M, Multi
  • Characters: Midoriya Izuku, Bakugou Katsuki, Todoroki Shouto, Kirishima Eijirou, Kaminari Denki, Class 1-A (My Hero Academia)
  • Relationships: Bakugou Katsuki/Midoriya Izuku, Midoriya Izuku/Todoroki Shouto, Kaminari Denki/Midoriya Izuku, Kirishima Eijirou/Midoriya Izuku
  • Additional Tags: Genderswap, FemDeku, Multiple Relationships, Fluff, potential sex
